headline: NFP Appoints Tom Gillingham, Head of Commercial Risk, and John Mahoney, Head of Programs
summary: NFP, an Aon company and leading property and casualty (P&C) broker and benefits consultant, today announced Tom Gillingham as president, Commercial Risk, expanding his executive leadership across NFP's commercial P&C, programs and wholesale businesses. The company also appointed John Mahoney head of Programs, Totalis Program Underwriters, NFP's Specialty MGA and MGU.
